name: Lora Rush
description:
Escape of your destiny with Lora in this action game, or stay hooked in the trip

Enjoy this free pixel art nintendo-like retro run game and be hooked on the marvelous trip you're in. Move to your gold rush, surf the nice happy mountains with the sun shine in you face, listen the awesome 16-bit music, but just don't take it too much, or you can be regret it.

But if you tired to run around your owl tail like a dog, tired to play with your rabbit, your bear, and you want to see what the world like he realy is, just don't take it. It's up to you.

Try to escape your scary destiny, figure our why you're in this thriller madhouse and tap like crazy to dodge and escape all dangers on this place like the minion doctors, drone guards, uber-like cars. Decide if your fate will be trip on this endless mad circus or if you will break the asylum lock and escape to the safety.

🤪 FEATURES

☆ Insane retro pixel art
☆ Endless run on this action freaky game
☆ Facebook connection
☆ Missions and true final
☆ 🐰 Rabbit, 🐶 dog, 🐻 bear and lots of other animals to dodge

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lorasrush/
Website: http://aipim.cc/lorarush
